an8.62:1.1: “Chahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano alam paresam.
an8.62:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:1.7: kalyanavaco ca hoti kalyanavakkarano, poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya;
an8.62:1.8: sandassako ca hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an8.62:1.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, chahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano alam paresam.
an8.62:2.1: Pancahi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano alam paresam.
an8.62:2.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:2.8: sandassako ca hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an8.62:2.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano alam paresam.
an8.62:3.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano nalam paresam.
an8.62:3.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:3.7: no ca kalyanavaco hoti kalyanavakkarano, poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya;
an8.62:3.8: no ca sandassako hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an8.62:3.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano nalam paresam.
an8.62:4.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam nalam attano.
an8.62:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:4.5: no ca dhatanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhita hoti;
an8.62:4.6: na ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an8.62:4.7: kalyanavaco ca hoti kalyanavakkarano …pe… atthassa vinnapaniya;
an8.62:4.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano.
an8.62:5.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano nalam paresam.
an8.62:5.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:5.7: no ca kalyanavaco hoti kalyanavakkarano, poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya;
an8.62:5.8: no ca sandassako hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an8.62:5.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, nalam paresam.
an8.62:6.1: Tihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano.
an8.62:6.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:6.5: no ca dhatanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhita hoti;
an8.62:6.6: no ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an8.62:6.8: sandassako ca hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an8.62:6.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, tihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano.
an8.62:7.1: Dvihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, nalam paresam.
an8.62:7.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:7.4: no ca sutanam dhammanam dharanajatiko hoti;
an8.62:7.7: no ca kalyanavaco hoti …pe… atthassa vinnapaniya;
an8.62:7.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam attano, nalam paresam.
an8.62:8.1: Dvihi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano.
an8.62:8.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu na heva kho khippanisanti ca hoti kusalesu dhammesu;
an8.62:8.4: no ca sutanam dhammanam dharanajatiko hoti;
an8.62:8.5: no ca dhatanam dhammanam atthupaparikkhita hoti;
an8.62:8.6: no ca atthamannaya dhammamannaya dhammanudhammappatipanno hoti;
an8.62:8.7: kalyanavaco ca hoti kalyanavakkarano, poriya vacaya samannagato vissatthaya anelagalaya atthassa vinnapaniya;
an8.62:8.8: sandassako ca hoti samadapako samuttejako sampahamsako sabrahmacarinam.
an8.62:8.9: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, dvihi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu alam paresam, nalam attano”ti.
